reviews.name: Aisha Kumar
reviews.title: Fashion Enthusiast
reviews.review: QuickBite has been a lifesaver during busy workdays. The food always arrives hot, fresh, and on time. Love the variety

reviews.name: Rajesh Patel
reviews.title: Loyal Customer
reviews.review: Super easy to order and track. Sometimes the delivery takes a few extra minutes, but the food quality is worth the wait.

reviews.name: Maya Singh
reviews.title: Food Blogger
reviews.review: Healthy meals delivered fast! As someone who watches calories, I appreciate the nutritional info and customizable meals.

reviews.name: Karan Verma
reviews.title: First-Time Shopper
reviews.review: Great app interface and smooth checkout. Would love to see more local restaurant options, but overall, very satisfied.
